alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Kossuth; Winnebago (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 3:49PM CDT until March 31 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kossuth County in north central Iowa... Western Hancock County in north central Iowa... Winnebago County in north central Iowa... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 349 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Benedict, or 10 miles east of Algona, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wesley around 355 PM CDT. Hutchins around 400 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Titonka, Crystal Lake, Woden, Buffalo Center, Thompson and Rake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Iowa.
